summary: Mr Beast organized a challenge where 100 kids and 100 adults competed to stay inside cubes for 100 hours, with the cube containing the most participants winning half a million dollars. Throughout the challenge, participants faced temptations, shrinking zones, and various surprises, with the adults ultimately emerging as the victorious team.
